DESCRIPTION.P: Emulator of C language sprintf function. According to the format tags of the sprintf function %[flags][width][.precision][length]specifier this implementation:
- Supports only the following specifiers: d(int32), u(uint32), f(real), c(int8);
The output is an int8 vector representing the ASCII codes of the whole string;

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Must be list("fmt1", "fmt2", ...) and each ""fmt"" supports up to one parameter.
The length of each ""fmt"" not including the null-terminator.
The size of output including the null-terminator. The maximum size is 64.
